title: Explore screen share / browser sharing methods
description:
Find ways to start a screen share or browser sharing session so BMO can push a link to Dave when needing help with verification checks, CAPTCHAs, etc.

Requirements:
- BMO initiates the session and sends a link
- Dave can join from mobile (not just desktop)
- Works for passing verification checks, visual confirmations
- Should be lightweight - no heavy installs on Dave's side

Explore options like:
- Browser-based screen sharing (no install)
- VNC/remote desktop with web client
- Headless browser with remote debugging
- Purpose-built tools for this use case

actions.note: Researched 8+ options. Top recommendation: Cloudflare Tunnel + VNC browser rendering (already have the tunnel). Browserbase for browser-only sharing. Saved to .claude/state/research/screen-sharing.md
